alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Chinati Mountains; Chisos Basin; Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Eastern Culberson County; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains; Marfa Plateau; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 09 at 2:03PM CST until January 12 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph in the plains. West winds 40 to 55 mph with gusts up to 80 mph in the mountains. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest Texas. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
